attributes.action: We demand the return of the Calaloo Show to British airwaves every Sunday night
attributes.background: The Calaloo Show brought joy to socaheads everywhere on Sunday evenings before it was abruptly taken off the air a year ago. We demand the immediate return of the Calaloo Show back to its Sunday night slot, so that socaheads can once again end the weekend in the style we have been accustomed to.
